==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ちょう|り|し|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
{{suffix|調理|師|t1=cooking|t2=professional|lang=ja|sort=ちょうりし}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ちょうりし}}

# professional [[cook]], [[chef]], especially a licensed chef

====Usage notes====
In Japan, this is a legal occupational title and people who practice work under this title must hold a professional chef's license from the government.

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|料理人|りょうりにん}}
* {{ja-r|コック}}
* {{ja-r|シェフ}}
